forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. West wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As night settles over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle curtain of clouds veils the city, bringing a soft coolness as temperatures dip to around 50 degrees. The west wind lightly whispers through the streets, creating a peaceful ambiance ideal for a contemplative stroll or a moment taken to appreciate the tranquil atmosphere. In the stillness, one might catch the faint outline of the Golden Gate Bridge, occasionally obscured by the elusive fog that dances around its towers, leaving just a hint of mystery lingering in the air.

Tomorrow promises a shift, as the sun peeks through with an inviting brightness, nudging the clouds aside for a mostly sunny day. A high near 60 will wrap around you like a warm embrace, but don’t forget that ever-present breeze which can be spirited at times, with gusts whispering along the West Coast. Dress in layers, perhaps a light sweater or jacket for the morning chill, and as the day progresses, shed that outer layer to soak in the sunshine that will surely coax spirits upward. Ideal activities might include wandering through the local cafes, sampling artisan pastries with a good book in hand, or visiting one of the quaint shops peppered throughout the neighborhoods. A walk along the waterfront could awaken your senses, enriched by the salty tang of the sea air that epitomizes this vibrant city.
